Should these properties be the ones to be themeable instead of OR alongside `thumbColor` and `trackColor`?

```dart
    this.activeColor,
    this.activeTrackColor,
    this.inactiveThumbColor,
    this.inactiveTrackColor,
```

The properties `thumbColor` and `trackColor` is to be used instead of these. MaterialStateProperty is the "future proof" way of handling the colors in different material states, and this theme would follow the pattern of how the new Buttons work.
